name: Bushleague Wizard
description:
Bushleague Wizard is a side-scrolling video game with roguelike features, in which you control a wizard carrying powerful spells and lacking enough mastery to dominate them.

The goal of the game is to improve your abilities by progressing through the dungeon, thus nullifying your magical instability.

[Spanish / Español]

Bushleague Wizard es un videojuego de desplazamiento lateral con características roguelike, en el que controlas a un mago portador de poderosos hechizos y carente del dominio suficiente para controlarlos.

El objetivo del juego es mejorar tus habilidades progresando a través de la mazmorra, para así anular tu inestabilidad mágica.

An HTML5 version has been added, if you find any bugs, please let me know. Still, I strongly recommend to play the Windows version.

[How to play]

ActionKeyMove leftAMove rightDJumpWLootEPause gameEnterShow cost/amountTab (Q for HTML5 vers)Cast FireballNumpad 1Case D-LaserNumpad 2Use HP PotionNumpad 4Use MP PotionNumpad 5

You can improve different characteristics of your character, like the effectiveness of the potions he consumes or his mastery of magic, by collecting the books that can be found on the shelves, or by leveling up.

A help text file is included in the .zip
